verbose_text: Moreover, although C. albicans or curdlan stimulation of wild-type BMDCs induces the rapid activation of the IKK complex, as determined by measuring IKKalpha / beta phosphorylation (XREF_FIG C; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A and S1B), this response is almost completely abolished in the absence of Vav proteins (XREF_FIG C; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A) or PKCdelta.
